title: Scikit-Learn
desc: Built and tested a bisecting k-means model in a team of 6 for the popular open-source machine learning library.

title: Image Cleaner
desc: A simple image cleaner that removes unwanted text using RBF regression. For course integrity, I will not share my source code, but will share the before/after image results instead.

title: Find Dining
desc: A website that promotes Scarborough restaurants to assist them through COVID-19.

title: Portfolio Site
tech: Typescript, HTML, CSS, Javascript, Angular, React
desc: My personal portfolio website. Has gone through various stages of evolution, from vanilla HTML/CSS/JS, to Angular, to React.

title: Doodle Jump
desc: A platform jumping game based on doodlejump. Created entirely in MIPS assembly code.

title: U-Impactify

desc: An online learning platform targeted towards Social Iniatives and Organizations, to help improve their infrastructure, operations, and expand their numbers.

title: MOOD
desc: A sentiment analysis webapp that will generate a list of movies, gifs, and music to accomodate your current mood.

title: Android Shopping App
desc: A simple shopping app built in Android Studio with a team of 3. Users can log in as customer, employee, or admin.

title: Heir to the Throne
desc: A point-and-click puzzle game made from vanilla HTML and JS. Players explore rooms and find clues to out the traitor amongst the royal family.
